results.title: Regular Manual Test Engineer
results.short_description: We are looking for Regular Manual Test Engineer
results.long_description:
• Working as a part of the testing team in Luxoft Automotive Account.
• Our client is an American multinational automaker.
• The main focus is to improve existing test strategy for HTML5 HMI testing and ensure the successful delivery of a quality product by writing and execution tests scenarios on a daily basis.
• You will work in a changing and challenging environment in a multicultural team.
• This position requires a highly motivated engineer with strong technical, communication skills.


Our team:
Fast growing, balanced, self-motivated

Technologies used:
Selenium
HTML5
CAN
Scrum
Responsibilities:
• Test cases creation and implementation.
• Testing of HTML5 based / hardware HMI; 
• Communication with developers, QAs and product owners; 
• Analyze business requirements, design documents for completeness and testability; 
• Execute test cases and update test documentation; 
• Create effective test reports and traceability matrix; 
• Review test failures and determine the sources of problems (test deficiencies, deviation from requirements, etc.) 
• Participate in setting test strategy for the given set of requirements
• Work with bug tracking system to record, trace and drive to resolution defects and issues discovered
• Support development team in issues reproduction and root cause analysis
• Report work progress continuously through attendance of daily & weekly project internal meetings
Mandatory Skills:
• Practical knowledge of Linux based OS
• Practical knowledge of test methodologies, relevant standards, processes and tools
• Understanding of HTTP, TCP protocols
• WebSocket understanding
• Experience of working with Subversion, Git, Maven, Jira, TestRail, Jenkins
• Analytical mind, willingness to understand complex systems and find their weaknesses
• Be proactive, self-motivated and self-disciplined
• High attention to details and organization
• At least basic knowledge in BASH, SSH


Nice-to-Have Skills:
• Practical knowledge of using Selenium
• Understanding of the Embedded systems testing
• Practical knowledge of WEB HMI / HTML5 testing
• Experience working in CMMI, ASPICE process environment
• Practical knowledge of V-Model of development and Automotive standards, e.g. ASPICE
• Practical knowledge of In-Vehicle and communication interfaces, e.g. CAN, FlexRay
• Participation and/or completion in testing certification programs (ISTQB, ISEB or tool specific certifications).
Languages:
English: B2 Upper Intermediate

recruiter.name: Halyna Taranenko
recruiter.employer_about:
Luxoft is a high-end application outsourcing provider of choice and a trusted technology advisor to Global 2000 and medium-sized growth companies that apply compelling technologies to obtain leadership positions in their respective markets. 
Luxoft today finds the Best talents, proposes career growth & employment benefits. Our teams are involved in high complicity & innovative projects for the Top leaders companies around the Globe.

results.title: Full-stack developer
results.short_description:
Matrix42 is one of the leading software vendors for workspace management solutions. Matrix42 provides future proven “Smarter Workspace — Better Life” solutions for state of the art workplaces.
We are looking for .NET Developer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.
results.long_description:
Matrix42 is one of the leading software vendors for workspace management solutions. Matrix42 provides future proven “Smarter Workspace — Better Life” solutions for state of the art workplaces.
We are looking for .NET Developer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.

Responsibilities:
Write clean, scalable code, remain up to date with concepts and best practices
Create new features; revise, update, refactor existing code
Develop technical specifications, design documentation and architecture
Participate in requirements analysis; assist POs, PMs in defining requirements and explain the capabilities and limitations of various systems
Test and deploy developed code, providing technical support
Coordinate with other software professionals and developers

Must:
3+ years of development experience, .NET, C#, SQL Server
Familiar with the ASP.NET framework, design/architectural patterns (at least MV
Experience in SQL Server
Knowledge of Javascript/Typescript, HTML5/CSS3, JQuery, JSON, XML, AJAX
Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (REST, RPC)
Strong understanding of source control repositories and the workflows (TFS, Azure DevOps);
Understanding of Agile methodologies
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills, attention to detail
MSc degree in SW engineering or similar
Good spoken and written English.

Nice to have:
WPF/WCF/WWF
Linux/Unix
Understanding of .Net Core architecture, microservices
Web API/RESTful server development using ASP.NET core
Experience with virtualization technologies (Docker)
Understanding of Microsoft Azure
Understanding of the Angular architecture
Unit testing frameworks

What’s in for your?
Highly competitive compensation
Long-term employment
Attractive benefits package
— paid sick leave
— vacations (25 working days)
— Medical Insurance
Participation in development of exciting and challenging solutions
Just refurbished office in downtown Kiev or remote work modal
Professional training which meets company needs
Regular company events locally and abroad
Casual, positive and open work environment

recruiter.name: Юлия Бородатова
recruiter.employer_about:
About Matrix42
Recognized by Gartner as a unique, visionary vendor, Matrix42 delivers and manages future-ready, self-service digital workspaces that meet the needs of today’s location-independent workforce. It achieves this with a complete, centralized and automated solution that provides authenticated access to workspaces across aggregated physical, virtual and mobile environments.
Advantages for executives
Business managers benefit from: an easier way to ensure software compliance; complete transparency over software deployment approval and license costs; a comprehensive overview of workspace infrastructure and the status of its components; and the ability to manage workspaces as an automated business process.
Advantages for IT managers
IT managers benefit from faster and simpler software distribution, support, management and maintenance. They use Matrix42’s products and solutions to become IT service providers, delivering role-specific workspaces to end user customers through extensive automation and consistent, self-service interfaces.
Advantages for users
End-users are empowered with authenticated, self-service access to an individualized workspace on any device, featuring the specific portfolio of applications they need to perform effectively.
Ultimately, the value of Matrix42 products and solutions can be measured in lower operational IT costs, greater software license efficiency, reduced IT admin workloads, simplified compliance fulfillment and happier, more productive employees.
That’s why over 3,000 organizations including BMW, Infineon and Carl Zeiss rely on Matrix42 every day.

results.title: QA Engineer
results.short_description: Matrix42 is one of the leading software vendors for workspace management solutions. Matrix42 provides future proven ’Smarter Workspace — Better Life’’ solutions for state of the art workplaces. For our office in Kiev we are looking for QA Engineer.
results.long_description:
MATRIX42 is a worldwide software producer for the IT System and Service Management, that offers an integrated range of products for medium to large enterprises, with its head quarter in Germany, is looking for an Senior QA Engineer to fill a long-term vacancy in the Kiev office*.
*Matrix42 Ukraine is presented for 10+ years and is a stable, product-oriented company (not projects).

Technical Skills

Good knowledge of different kinds of testing
Strong software and web application testing experience
3+ years Experience in Test Automation testing using Selenium WebDriver or Protractor frameworks
3+ Experience with JavaScript and Powershell scripting languages
Experience with bug tracking and test management tools

Soft Skills

Strong product quality orientation
Analytical and problem-understanding thinking
Self-motivating and team-playing attitude
Good English in speech and writing
Higher technical education or other relevant experience

Будет плюсом
As a plus

DevOps (bash and CI maintaining)
Knowledge of Web services and API testing (REST)
Security, Performance testing
Experience with Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS)
Knowledge of development processes
Experience with agile methodologies, especially Scrum
Experience with business applications or business management topics
Knowledge and experience with any CI system

Предлагаем
We offer

Highly Competitive compensation (depends on the candidate level)
Long-term employment
Attractive benefits package
Paid sick leave
vacations (25 working days)
Medical Insurance
Participation in development of exciting and challenging solutions
Office in downtown Kiev or remote working modal 
Professional training which meets company needs
Free coffee, tea, juice, snacks
Regular company events locally and abroad

Responsibilities

Creating test strategies and test cases for end-to-end feature testing
Testing of the customer problems and hotfixes
Improving test automation framework
Maintaining existing test environment
Root causes analysis of failed tests

results.title: Automation QA Engineer (Java)
results.short_description: MATRIX42 is a worldwide software producer for the IT System and Service Management, that offers an integrated range of products for medium to large enterprises, with its head quarter in Germany, is looking for an Automation QA Engineer to fill a long-term vacancy in the Kiev office.
results.long_description:
MATRIX42 is a worldwide software producer for the IT System and Service Management, that offers an integrated range of products for medium to large enterprises, with its head quarter in Germany, is looking for an Automation QA Engineer to fill a long-term vacancy in the Kiev office.

Responsibilities:
Creating test strategies and test cases for end-to-end feature testing
Testing of the customer problems and hotfixes
Improving test automation framework
Maintaining existing test environment
Root causes analysis of failed tests

Must:

Java 8/11
RabbitMQ messaging (Kafka would be a plus)
MongoDB (experience with sharding would be a plus)
REST API (and some SOAP)
Good knowledge of different kinds of testing
Web application testing experience
Experience with bug tracking and test management tools
BSc/MSc degree in SW engineering or similar
Good spoken and written English

Nice to have:

Selenium WebDriver or Protractor frameworks
JavaScript and Powershell scripting languages
Experience with virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V, Docker)
Unit testing frameworks
Agile/Scrum
TFS, Azure DevOps
DevOps fundamentals

What’s in for your?

Сompetitive compensation
Long-term employment
Attractive benefits package
Paid sick leave
Vacations (25 working days)
Medical insurance
Participation in development of exciting and challenging solutions
Office in downtown Kiev or remote work modal
Professional training which meets company needs
Regular company events locally and abroad
Casual, positive and open work environment

results.short_description:

We are looking for JAVA Developer to join Kyiv team on a full-time basis.

Matrix42 is one of the leading software vendors for workspace management solutions. Matrix42 provides future proven “Smarter Workspace — Better Life” solutions for state of the art workplaces.

Test and deploy developed code, providing technical support

RabbitMQ messaging (Kafka would be a plus)  
MongoDB (experience with sharding would be a plus)

Design Patterns (Enterprise Integration Patterns, GoF, microservices, etc.)  
Git (GitLab)  
Spring STS (IDE)  
Experience developing large-scale enterprise applications  
Experience integrating with other products and APIs 
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills, attention to detail 
Looking for someone with a great attitude, works well with others, and thrives in a startup type environment  
BSc/MSc degree in SW engineering or similar 
Good spoken and written English 
 

Nice to have: 

Experience with virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V, Docker) 
Unit testing frameworks 
Agile/Scrum 
TFS, Azure DevOps 
DevOps fundamentals
